mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Hot Line-Late News", "As I See It", "History of the Dance", "What Are They Dancing?", "How We Dance", "Take a Good Look-Coordinate", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Square Dance Diary", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers: Herb and Erna Egender", "Callers Text-Chapter Thirty-four", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab-Peel the Top", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "On the Record: Reviews", "Caller of the Month: Chris Vear", "Let's Count the Basics-Revisited", and "Fashion Feature".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
